React.name: Chat App
React.description: I created a Chat-App website with Google account authentication from firebase, I created this website to learn about the chat-engine and Oauth libraries on firebase. One of the difficulties I encountered when creating this website was the integration between react.js and the chat engine library, and to overcome this problem, I had to go back to reading the documentation about the chat engine library and also look for references to the problem I was experiencing.
